props.name: items
props.description: A collection of `Item` props and `Item`-level custom `Item` renderers.

props.name: title
props.description: A descriptive title for the panel

props.name: subtitle
props.description: When provided, a subtitle is displayed below the title

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Text used in anchor when there are no selected items

props.name: placeholderText
props.description: Text used as placeholder for search input

props.name: inputLabel
props.description: The aria-label for the filter input

props.name: aria-label
props.description: aria-label to attach to the base DOM node of the list

props.name: filterValue
props.description: The current value of the search input

props.name: open
props.description: Determines whether the overlay portion of the component should be shown or not

props.name: anchorId
props.description: An override to the internal id that will be spread on to the renderAnchor

props.name: anchorRef
props.description:
An override to the internal renderAnchor ref that will be used to position the overlay.
When renderAnchor is null this can be used to make an anchor that is detached from ActionMenu.
An override to the internal ref that will be spread on to the renderAnchor

props.name: onSelectedChange
props.description: Provide a callback called when the selected item(s) change

props.name: onFilterChange
props.description: Callback when the search input changes

props.name: footer
props.description: Footer rendered at the end of the panel
